scripts.preview: npm run build:worker && NODE_ENV=production wrangler dev
scripts.deploy: npm run build:worker && NODE_ENV=production wrangler deploy
scripts.preview:front: npm run build:worker && wrangler dev -c wrangler.front.toml
scripts.deploy:front: npm run build:worker && wrangler deploy -c wrangler.front.toml
scripts.pages:pre: npm run build:worker && cp .next/server/app/index.meta .next/server/app/index.meta.json && cp scripts/pages/_worker.js .next/assets/ && cp wrangler.toml wrangler.main.toml && cp wrangler.pages.toml wrangler.toml
scripts.preview:pages: npm run pages:pre && wrangler pages dev; npm run pages:post
scripts.deploy:pages: npm run pages:pre && wrangler pages deploy; npm run pages:post
